name: Game Ball Dungeons 2
description:
Play handball with fantasy characters in dangerous dungeons.

Game Ball Dungeons is a couch mutliplayer game combining the handball game with the platformer game, adding game features like class, traps, and a heroic fantasy atmosphere. 

Features :

- An intuitive 2-button controls, easy to handle.

- A versus mode, with 3 unique game modes and a large game customisation.

- An arcade mode, alone or co-op against the IA.

- A pixel-art aestetic full of particles.

- 8 playable characters with uniques abilities.

- More than 30 arenas in 5 environments.

___________

Controls : Gamepads are automatically detected, if you want to play with the keyboard, do CTRL + Y when the game is windowed to change keyboard controls.
